title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog does not respond to cancellation.
EB: The progress dialog immediately closes and the exception breakpoint is added regardless of the cancellation request.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:

1. Open the application in debug mode
2. Open the breakpoint view
3. Click on "Add Exception Breakpoint"
4. In the progress dialog, click on the "Cancel" button

Expected behavior: The progress dialog should close and the exception breakpoint should not be added.

Potential solution: Modify the code that handles the progress dialog to either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button by passing "false" for the "cancellable" parameter when calling "ProgressMonitorDialog.run".
